Clearly a bit taken aback by sitting next to David Letterman , Aaron Rodgers explains the game, his calm demeanor and that shiny belt they threw on him during the awards presentation. The belt has really caught on, says Aaron Rodgers of the WWE World Championship belt, complete with spinning logo. "It's a celebration that stared during practice, and the fans love it. You've got to give them what they love.
